metadata.name: Companion
metadata.description:
Together we can

Just always be by my side

Will never let go

This image of the Shirahige Shrine in Shiga Prefecture was taken during the second-year anniversary of Kevin and his wife before they got married. Instead of renting a car to go to this destination, they preferred the long way. They took a train, ate in a convenience store, rented a bike, and enjoyed the view. Finally, upon reaching the place, Kevin saw two birds on the right side of the torii which made him smile, thus came up with the haiku for this image.
